category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 16 (Reasons for exclusion from general meeting resolution)
contents: Article 16 (Reasons for exclusion from general meeting resolution) If the chairman or delegates fall under any of the following, they may not participate in the resolution. 1. When deciding on matters concerning oneself in the election or dismissal of executives 2. When the interests of oneself and the city/provincial sports council are conflicting due to matters involving the exchange of money or property
